verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came again unto me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Howl<WH3213> ye, Woe worth<WH1929> the day<WH3117>!
For the day<WH3117> is near<WH7138>, even the day<WH3117> of the LORD<WH3068> is near<WH7138>, a cloudy<WH6051> day<WH3117>; it shall be the time<WH6256> of the heathen<WH1471>.

And the sword<WH2719> shall come<WH935> upon Egypt<WH4714>, and great pain<WH2479> shall be in Ethiopia<WH3568>, when the slain<WH2491> shall fall<WH5307> in Egypt<WH4714>, and they shall take away<WH3947> her multitude<WH1995>, and her foundations<WH3247> shall be broken down<WH2040>.

Ethiopia<WH3568>, and Libya<WH6316>, and Lydia<WH3865>, and all the mingled<WH6154> people, and Chub<WH3552>, and the men<WH1121> of the land<WH776> that is in league<WH1285>, shall fall<WH5307> with them by the sword<WH2719>.

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>; They also that uphold<WH5564> Egypt<WH4714> shall fall<WH5307>; and the pride<WH1347> of her power<WH5797> shall come down<WH3381>: from the tower<WH4024> of Syene<WH5482> shall they fall<WH5307> in it by the sword<WH2719>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.

And they shall be desolate<WH8074> in the midst<WH8432> of the countries<WH776> that are desolate<WH8074>, and her cities<WH5892> shall be in the midst<WH8432> of the cities<WH5892> that are wasted<WH2717>.
And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I have set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Egypt<WH4714>, and when all her helpers<WH5826> shall be destroyed<WH7665>.

In that day<WH3117> shall messengers<WH4397> go forth<WH3318> from me<WH6440> in ships<WH6716> to make the careless<WH983> Ethiopians<WH3568> afraid<WH2729>, and great pain<WH2479> shall come upon them, as in the day<WH3117> of Egypt<WH4714>: for, lo, it cometh<WH935>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; I will also make the multitude<WH1995> of Egypt<WH4714> to cease<WH7673> by the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>.

He and his people<WH5971> with him, the terrible<WH6184> of the nations<WH1471>, shall be brought<WH935> to destroy<WH7843> the land<WH776>: and they shall draw<WH7324> their swords<WH2719> against Egypt<WH4714>, and fill<WH4390> the land<WH776> with the slain<WH2491>.

And I will make<WH5414> the rivers<WH2975> dry<WH2724>, and sell<WH4376> the land<WH776> into the hand<WH3027> of the wicked<WH7451>: and I will make the land<WH776> waste<WH8074>, and all that is therein<WH4393>, by the hand<WH3027> of strangers<WH2114>: I the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; I will also destroy<WH6> the idols<WH1544>, and I will cause their images<WH457> to cease<WH7673> out of Noph<WH5297>; and there shall be no more a prince<WH5387> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>: and I will put<WH5414> a fear<WH3374> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
And I will make Pathros<WH6624> desolate<WH8074>, and will set<WH5414> fire<WH784> in Zoan<WH6814>, and will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in No<WH4996>.
And I will pour<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> upon Sin<WH5512>, the strength<WH4581> of Egypt<WH4714>; and I will cut off<WH3772> the multitude<WH1995> of No<WH4996>.

And I will set<WH5414> fire<WH784> in Egypt<WH4714>: Sin<WH5512> shall have great<WH2342> pain<WH2342>, and No<WH4996> shall be rent asunder<WH1234>, and Noph<WH5297> shall have distresses<WH6862> daily<WH3119>.
The young men<WH970> of Aven<WH206> and of Pi-beseth<WH6364> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>: and these cities shall go<WH3212> into captivity<WH7628>.

At Tehaphnehes<WH8471> also the day<WH3117> shall be darkened<WH2821><WH2820>, when I shall break<WH7665> there the yokes<WH4133> of Egypt<WH4714>: and the pomp<WH1347> of her strength<WH5797> shall cease<WH7673> in her<WH1931>: as for her, a cloud<WH6051> shall cover<WH3680> her, and her daughters<WH1323> shall go<WH3212> into captivity<WH7628>.
Thus will I execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> in Egypt<WH4714>: and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

Â¶ And it came to pass in the eleventh<WH259><WH6240> year<WH8141>, in the first<WH7223> month, in the seventh<WH7651> day of the month<WH2320>, that the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, I have broken<WH7665> the arm<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>; and, lo, it shall not be bound up<WH2280> to be healed<WH7499><WH5414>, to put<WH7760> a roller<WH2848> to bind<WH2280> it, to make it strong<WH2388> to hold<WH8610> the sword<WH2719>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I am against Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, and will break<WH7665> his arms<WH2220>, the strong<WH2389>, and that which was broken<WH7665>; and I will cause the sword<WH2719> to fall<WH5307> out of his hand<WH3027>.
And I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations<WH1471>, and will disperse<WH2219> them through the countries<WH776>.

And I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and put<WH5414> my sword<WH2719> in his hand<WH3027>: but I will break<WH7665> Pharaoh's<WH6547> arms<WH2220>, and he shall groan<WH5008> before<WH6440> him with the groanings<WH5009> of a deadly wounded<WH2491> man.

But I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and the arms<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> shall fall down<WH5307>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I shall put<WH5414> my sword<WH2719> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and he shall stretch it out<WH5186> upon the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
And I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations<WH1471>, and disperse<WH2219> them among the countries<WH776>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
